title: Lucifer's Tongue
description: Seeking revenge on a bestselling Christian author named Nathaniel Onsted (who may have been the cause of William McDollan's house burning down and the deaths of his family), William and a group of college professors from the Truth Academy stage a murder in the form of a faux ritual from an ancient Hebrew artifact called the Book of Six--also known as Lucifer's Tongue . . .. . . the only probably was, the ritual worked.
author: Jordan Page
